title: Hotkeys in Quorum Blocks
description: Find the list of hotkeys and read through the options then go to the next problem.
hint: You can use the mouse or the keyboard to press the fourth button on the toolbar. When using the keyboard, use TAB to go to the hotkeys button and press ENTER. There is also a shortcut key of CTRL + SHIFT + H that can be used when you are working in the block editor.
